name: CLARITY_DIVISION
description: This table contains information about your division records. This includes the division's address as well as other division-specific information. The records in this table are Division (DPG) records.

columns.name: DIVISION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the division record.

columns.name: DIVISION_ID_DIVISION_NAME
columns.description: The name of the division record.

columns.name: DIVISION_NAME
columns.description: The name of the division record.
